verbose_text: This difference disappeared when CD40L expressing OT-I T hybridoma cells were added to the culture, with the CD40L deficient cells proliferating just as well as the CD40L-competent cells, suggesting that the reduction in proliferative capacity exhibited by the OT-I CD40L -/- CD8 + T cells was not due to some inherent defect and that an exogenous source of CD40L could " rescue " them.
